definition: room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: She says my roommate decorates her bed so nice, and mind was just normal.
sentences.chinese: 她說我室友的牀單那麼美，而我得那麼的普通。
我這室友還真是客氣啊。

sentences.english: They became close friends and lived together from sophomore year until their graduation in 2004, Travis' sister, Ryan Manion-Borek, told CNN.
sentences.chinese: 從大二開始一直到2004年畢業時，兩人都是室友。

sentences.english: I have lived with other roommates where they were not so clean.
sentences.chinese: 我也和其他室友住過，他們可沒那麼愛乾淨。

sentences.english: Get a new roommate or move to a new place.
sentences.chinese: 交到一個新室友或者搬去一個新地方。

sentences.english: Don't just grab anything from your mother's or flatmate's cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 不要隨意抓上您母親或者室友的洗面用品就用。

sentences.english: Wang and his roommates used 10 buckets of water to fill the inflatable pool.
sentences.chinese: 王曉星和室友們用了10桶水才把充氣泳池填滿。

sentences.english: In the pilot, we are introduced to Felicity's creepy roommate.
sentences.chinese: 先鋒隊中介紹了費的令人毛骨悚然的室友。

sentences.english: But when I met Riley (My roommate) I felt like he is one of us.
sentences.chinese: 但當我見到室友賴利時，我覺得他就是我們中的一員。

sentences.english: Naomi Rockler-GladenLiving in a small college dorm room with a roommate is not easy!
sentences.chinese: 在大學裏，與室友生活在一個小寢室裏真不容易。

sentences.english: Hey, did you pick a roommate?
Well, you want to talk to your roommate about this
sentences.chinese: 但是，你想跟你的室友談一下。

sentences.english: My roommate congratulated me on passing the driving test.
sentences.chinese: 我的室友祝賀我通過了駕照考試。

sentences.english: And your roommate would be very pleased.
sentences.chinese: 想必你的室友會很開心。

sentences.english: Scott and Paul are rooates and also classmates at Chengchi University.
sentences.chinese: 史考特和保羅是政治大學的室友兼同窗。

definition: to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
(coll.) (a woman's) close female friend/bestie/(originally written 閨密|闺密, an abbr. for 閨中密友|闺中密友)
to be in the same class/to be in the same squad/classmate
